title: League Client not working
body: So my game has been working just fine up until today (i even played it yesterday) and today when i try to launch it nothing happens. Loading circle spins around my mouse for a few seconds and then dissapears. Game doesn't start even after 20 minutes since i first clicked. What do I need to do? Game was working just before too, so I don't know if it's related to the new client.

replies.body: A recent windows or software update may have changed your OS security settings, so it could be preventing the patcher from launching.  Try out the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to start off by making sure access is being allowed.  Let me know if that helps!
